title: How to structure the IB math HL IA - Quora

response.answer_text: For my past experience, although the calculation matters, the evaluation, conclusion and the internal logic are more important. So just don't find something that’s super complex and you don't understand well or can only use the formula to substitute. The whole structure can be intro, calculation while discussion, evaluatio and conclusion. Some diagrams will be super helpful.
Well, I am sharing a link of a website here. I think if you go through it you must be able to get what you are looking for IB IA Tutors | TOK | Online and Face to Face IB IA Tutors | Est 2010
